sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-col class="selection-chat-container">
    <el-row class="chat-container">
      <QuestionComponent :question="questions[questionIndex]"/>
    </el-row>
    <el-row class="answer-input-container">
      <el-input
        class="answer-input"
        placeholder=""
        suffix-icon="el-icon-position"
        v-model="asnwer"
        @change="onEnter">
      </el-input>
    </el-row>
  </el-col>
</template>

<script>
import seeds from '../assets/sorting_hat.json'
import QuestionComponent from '../components/QuestionComponent.vue'

export default {
  name: 'SelectionChat',
  components: {
    QuestionComponent,
  },
  data () {
    return {
      questions: seeds,
      questionIndex: 0,
      asnwer: '',
      houses: {
        g: 0,
        h: 0,
        r: 0,
        s: 0
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onEnter() {
      const actualQuestion = this.questions[this.questionIndex]
      const scores = actualQuestion.answers.filter(answer => {
        let testAnswer = answer.title.toLowerCase()
        let userAnswer = this.asnwer.toLowerCase()
        console.log(answer.title.toLowerCase())
        if (testAnswer === userAnswer) {
          return answer.scores
        }
      })
      console.log(this.asnwer)
      console.log(actualQuestion.answers)
      console.log(scores)
    }
  }
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
.answer-input-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-start;
}

.answer-input {
  width: 40%;
  margin: 5px
}
</style>
